selected_skills.name: identify_objects_in_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To identify and extract geometric elements such as points and angles from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash and object properties to identify angle H and other relevant geometric elements in the diagram.

new_skill_specs.name: determine_angle_measure
new_skill_specs.purpose: To calculate the measure of a specific angle using known angles and geometric constraints.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The measure of the specified angle.
edge_cases: If the angle cannot be determined due to insufficient information, return None.

new_skill_specs.name: map_measure_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: To map a calculated angle measure to the closest multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the closest matching option.
edge_cases: If the measure does not match any option, return 'None'.
